constraints.name: gcd_multiplication
constraints.description: 对于任意区间 [i, j]，计算 gcd(a_i, a_{i+1}, ..., a_j) 与 max(a_i, a_{i+1}, ..., a_j) 的乘积 P(i, j)
constraints.formal: P(i, j) = G(i, j) * M(i, j), where G(i, j) = gcd(a_i, a_{i+1}, ..., a_j) and M(i, j) = max(a_i, a_{i+1}, ..., a_j)

constraints.name: sum_of_products
constraints.description: 计算所有可能的区间 [i, j] 的 P(i, j) 之和 F(A)
constraints.formal: F(A) = sum(P(i, j)) for all 1 <= i <= j <= N

constraints.name: modulo_constraint
constraints.description: 最终结果需要对 1000000007 取模
